dashboard.description: Metrics from PMS, Sonarr and Radarr (based on Varken official v1.5)

targets.query: SELECT "total_bandwidth" FROM "Tautulli" WHERE ("type" = 'current_stream_stats') AND $timeFilter
SELECT last("total") FROM "Tautulli" WHERE ("type" = 'library_stats' AND "section_name" = 'Movies' OR "section_name" = 'Movies - 4K' AND "section_name" = 'Movies - 3D') AND $timeFilter
SELECT last("episodes") FROM "Tautulli" WHERE ("type" = 'library_stats' AND "section_name" = 'TV Shows') AND $timeFilter
SELECT last("total") FROM "Tautulli" WHERE ("type" = 'library_stats' AND "section_name" = 'Video - Downloads - Unsorted') AND $timeFilter

targets.expr: (sum by(instance) (irate(node_cpu_seconds_total{host_system="crush", mode!="idle"}[$__rate_interval])) / on(instance) group_left sum by (instance)((irate(node_cpu_seconds_total{host_system="crush"}[$__rate_interval])))) * 100

targets.query: SELECT last("total") FROM "Tautulli" WHERE ("type" = 'library_stats' AND "section_name" = 'Videos - Misc') AND $timeFilter
SELECT count("hash") FROM "Tautulli" WHERE ("type" = 'Session') AND $timeFilter
SELECT "lan_bandwidth" FROM "Tautulli" WHERE ("type" = 'current_stream_stats') AND $timeFilter
SELECT distinct("total") FROM "Tautulli" WHERE ("type" = 'library_stats' AND "section_name" = 'Movies') AND $timeFilter
SELECT distinct("episodes") FROM "Tautulli" WHERE ("type" = 'library_stats' AND "section_name" = 'TV Shows') AND $timeFilter
SELECT "direct_play_streams" FROM "Tautulli" WHERE ("type" = 'current_stream_stats') AND $timeFilter
SELECT last("total") FROM "Tautulli" WHERE ("type" = 'library_stats' AND "section_name" = 'Movies - 4K') AND $timeFilter
SELECT last("seasons") FROM "Tautulli" WHERE ("type" = 'library_stats' AND "section_name" = 'TV Shows') AND $timeFilter
SELECT last("total") FROM "Tautulli" WHERE ("type" = 'library_stats' AND "section_name" = 'Movies (Not Backed Up)') AND $timeFilter
SELECT "direct_streams" FROM "Tautulli" WHERE ("type" = 'current_stream_stats') AND $timeFilter
SELECT mean("wan_bandwidth") FROM "Tautulli" WHERE ("type" = 'current_stream_stats') AND $timeFilter
SELECT last("total") FROM "Tautulli" WHERE ("type" = 'library_stats' AND "section_name" = 'Movies - 3D') AND $timeFilter
SELECT last("total") FROM "Tautulli" WHERE ("type" = 'library_stats' AND "section_name" = 'TV Shows') AND $timeFilter
SELECT last("total") FROM "Tautulli" WHERE ("type" = 'library_stats' AND "section_name" = 'TV Shows (Not Backed Up)') AND $timeFilter
SELECT distinct("episodes") FROM "Tautulli" WHERE ("type" = 'library_stats' AND "section_name" = 'TV Shows (Not Backed Up)') AND $timeFilter
SELECT "transcode_streams" FROM "Tautulli" WHERE ("type" = 'current_stream_stats') AND $timeFilter
SELECT count(distinct("hash")) FROM "Tautulli" WHERE ("type" = 'Session') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "video_decision", "friendly_name"
SELECT count(distinct("hash")) FROM "Tautulli" WHERE ("type" = 'Session') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "device_type", "friendly_name"
SELECT count(distinct("hash")) FROM "Tautulli" WHERE ("type" = 'Session') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "friendly_name"
SELECT count(distinct("hash")) FROM "Tautulli" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(0)

SELECT distinct("hash") FROM "Tautulli" WHERE ("type" = 'Session') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "friendly_name",  "title", "quality", "video_decision", "quality_profile", "platform", "product_version", "location", "player_state"
SELECT distinct("hash") FROM "Sonarr" WHERE ("type" = 'Queue') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "protocol_id", "sxe", "name"
SELECT distinct("hash") FROM "Radarr" WHERE ("Missing_Available" = '0') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "name"
SELECT distinct("hash") FROM "Sonarr" WHERE ("type" = 'Future') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "downloaded", "name", "sxe"
SELECT distinct("hash") FROM "Radarr" WHERE ("type" = 'Queue') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "name", "protocol_id", "quality", "protocol"
SELECT distinct("hash") FROM "Sonarr" WHERE ("type" = 'Missing') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "name", "sxe", "server"

panels.description:
Peer exchange allows a group of users (or peers) that are collaborating to share a given file to do so more swiftly and efficiently. PEX allows peers in a swarm to exchange information about the swarm directly without asking (polling) a tracker computer or a DHT. By doing so, PEX leverages the knowledge of peers that a user is connected to by asking them for the addresses of peers that they are connected to. This is faster and more efficient than relying solely on one tracker and reduces the processing load on the tracker. It also keep swarms together when the tracker is down.
https://www.wikiwand.com/en/Peer_exchange
panels.title: Peer Exchange

dashboard.title: Media (Plex - Sonarr - Radarr - Deluge)
